Package org.apache.lenya.cms.rc

Class Summary
CheckInEntry A checkin entry
CheckOutEntry A Checkout entry
RCEnvironment Helper class that holds the revision controller configuration
RCML Handle with the RCML file
RCMLEntry A RCML entry
RevisionController Controller for the reserved check-in, check-out, the backup versions and the rollback
 

Exception Summary
FileReservedCheckInException Reserved check-in exception
FileReservedCheckOutException Exception for already checked out files
RevisionControlException A revision control exception.
